original_text: A nation that you have not known shall eat up the fruit of your ground and of all your labors, and you shall be only oppressed and crushed continually,
korean_text: 네 토지 소산과 네 수고로 얻은 것을 네가 알지 못하는 민족이 먹겠고 너는 항상 압제와 학대를 받을 뿐이리니

sentences.original_text: A nation that you have not known
shall eat up the fruit of your ground

sentences.korean_translation: 네 모든 수고의 것도 먹을 것이요

sentences.original_text: and you shall be only oppressed
